bank_statement.name: Bank Statement Analysis
bank_statement.description: Comprehensive analysis of bank statements for legal review and due diligence.

criteria.title: Account Information & Identification
criteria.description: Extract account holder name, account number, bank name, statement period, account type (checking/savings), and any identifying information.

criteria.title: Balance Analysis
criteria.description: Identify opening balance, closing balance, average daily balance, minimum balance during period, and balance trends (increasing/decreasing/stable).

criteria.title: Transaction Patterns
criteria.description: Analyze deposit frequency and amounts, withdrawal patterns, recurring transactions, large or unusual transactions (>$1000), and categorize transaction types (salary, rent, utilities, transfers, etc.).

criteria.title: Income Sources
criteria.description: Identify all income sources, total income for period, regularity of income deposits, employer information if available, and any irregular income.

criteria.title: Expense Analysis
criteria.description: Calculate total expenses for period, identify major expense categories, recurring bills and obligations, discretionary spending, and debt payments visible.

criteria.title: Red Flags & Risk Assessment
criteria.description: Identify overdrafts or NSF fees, suspicious transactions, cash deposits/withdrawals that may need explanation, gambling or high-risk activities, liens or garnishments, and overall financial health assessment.

credit_report.name: Credit Report Analysis
credit_report.description: Detailed analysis of credit reports for legal and financial assessment.

criteria.title: Personal Information
criteria.description: Extract full name, current address, previous addresses, date of birth, Social Security Number (if visible), employment information, and verify accuracy.

criteria.title: Credit Score & Rating
criteria.description: Identify credit score(s), scoring model used (FICO, VantageScore), score range and interpretation (Excellent 750+, Good 700-749, Fair 650-699, Poor <650), and factors affecting score.

criteria.title: Credit Accounts Summary
criteria.description: List all open accounts, closed accounts, total number of accounts, types of accounts (credit cards, mortgages, auto loans, student loans, personal loans), credit limits, current balances, and available credit.

criteria.title: Payment History
criteria.description: Analyze on-time payment percentage, late payments (30/60/90+ days), missed payments, payment trends over time, oldest account age, and recent account activity.

criteria.title: Debt Analysis
criteria.description: Calculate total debt amount, credit utilization ratio (should be <30%), debt-to-income indicators, revolving vs installment debt, high balance accounts, and monthly payment obligations.

criteria.title: Negative Items & Public Records
criteria.description: Identify bankruptcies, foreclosures, repossessions, collections accounts, charge-offs, judgments, tax liens, inquiries (hard/soft), and dates these items will be removed from report.

generic.name: Generic Document Review
generic.description: General document analysis for various financial documents.

criteria.title: Document Identification
criteria.description: Identify document type, date, issuing entity, and key parties involved.

criteria.title: Key Information Extraction
criteria.description: Extract all relevant financial data, dates, amounts, and identifying information.

criteria.title: Analysis & Insights
criteria.description: Provide analysis of the document's contents, trends, patterns, and notable items.

criteria.title: Risk Assessment
criteria.description: Identify any red flags, inconsistencies, or items requiring further investigation.
